name: will baxter
text: Great selection, friendly staff and great prices.

name: Wes Allday
text: Overpriced, marginal selection. Stick to online shopping unless it's absolutely necessary.

name: scarlett pinkard
text: I personally love this store!, Payed a reasonable price for cosplay elf ears, and they got to me within 2 days!, They look amazing!, I would recommend buying from here!

name: Sammy
text:
Ordered online so idk if it’s relevant but omg very happy w my costumes!!! Not only were they price appropriate (or maybe on the more affordable side) but they were like super fresh as in unused and unopened. They arrived mad quick too which was unexpected considering everything’s thats happening in the usa .

Very pleased w my Minnie and fortune teller costume! Will order again nxt year

name: Vivian Chavarria
text: Just to let any travelers know- as the blonde woman said upon my arrival “ We are not a store, this is a warehouse, you have to order online “. So you definitely can’t trust google and don’t expect they’ll let you sit in the lobby either. It’s raining and I still had to wait outside for a lyft

name: Machelle Keotting
text:
I bought the Maryjane clown shoes for $24.95.
They are so cheaply made I dont even know if they will last through the party. Definately NOT WORTH $24.95!!

name: Star Crystal
text: Awesome prices

name: Kristin Walters
text: Family-owned business that lets you shop online and pick up at their warehouse within an hour. Convenient for last-minute costumes and party supplies.

name: Stephaine Buffaloe
text: Nice local costume place. Order online and pickup typically the next day free.

name: Yvonne Jackson
text: I dont like the idea of searching online and waiting for your order to process. I miss walking in a store and purchasing as needed.

name: Blake chappell
text: I highly recommend if you ever need a costume are anything that you need for a costume the staff will happily order it for you.The owners and the staff are very kind and very helpful. I will be going back every year. This place is not just for Halloween it's for year-round occasions. 🤠👹🤡👩‍🚒🕵️🦸🦹🧙🎅🤶🧛🧟🕷️⛄🎃🎄⚰️

name: Bekah Stephens
text: They had some pretty good costumes but everything was really messy and hard to sort through. Would probably go back though if what I was after was the type of thing they would have.

name: Khem Green
text: Emily Summerhill is the owner of this store. She assisted me with a 24 hour notice in finding a gown for a ball....why buy when you can rent?!  This store has a wide array of gowns/costumes for ANY occasion.  Also, her "assistant" Lilo is there to help with the finishing touches (Emily's daughter and future CEO). ☺

name: Amber Jean Hyde
text: I called last minute in search of a T-Rex costume and they not only put it up for me until I could get there but made sure I knew how to use the controls to inflate it. My nephew loved that I wore that costume and I am so thankful that there were so kind and helpful! Will definitely be back!

name: David Knight
text: wonderful business to shop in.

name: lelo Summerhill
text: Huge selection

name: Anna Jones
text: Great selection!!!

name: John Staggs
text:
Me and my girl have made Enchantasys a regular part of our dating routine. The staff are amazingly helpful and eagerly match our curiosity, opening boxes and letting us sample the various toys, restraints, outfits, etc... We will often go in just to wander and let our minds do the rest. Enchantasys is a wonderful destination for everyone from seasoned kinksters to the blushing newbies.
I give it a full three thumbs up, 5 ⭐

name: Phil Hansen
text: Easily the nicest, cleanest, friendliest adult store in north Alabama. Attentive service but not overbearing. Well stocked, organized, and clean. And Meghan provided great customer service, I'll shop there just for her help.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your recent visit and kind words.

name: Haley *
text:
Best adult store in Huntsville by far! The owner and her staff are astonishingly knowledgeable and they are the kindest people I’ve ever encountered!
The store is laid out beautifully and everything is well organized for your needs!
Super positive vibes and energy here as well while you shop! I can’t wait to come back!
Thank you Toni for everything!!!

resp.text: 🥰 Thank you so much! We appreciate you and we can't wait to see you again!

name: Elisa Hardy
text: The owner and cashier were amazing and even gave me a good bag being that I traveled over an hour to shop with them. Great vibes, they were extremely informative on everything I was looking for. If I’m ever back in Alabama or  Tennessee I’m definitely stopping by again!

name: Emily Motes
text:
Meghan was so so helpful in picking outfits that would look good on me and very knowledgeable with all the toys.
It feels very open, warm, and inviting!
I love the bedazzled PP they have named Pierre.

name: Cecil Sigman
text: I have been taken over, I use to frequent pleasures on university.  Till I visited Enchantasys, customer service great my wife redhead we resently met this young redhead who is very helpful, and beautiful .I'm like dam

name: JasonCat Partridge
text: These comments are amazing .... We're stopping by later because this is apparently the place to go for the good vibes and i even read they even have the great ones to . 👍

name: Kermit The Frog
text: Love the selection, atmosphere, and the ladies were extremely polite and helpful! Will do my business there forever!

resp.text: Thank you so very much! We enjoy shopping with our customers 😊

name: Becky W.
text: Not only was I impressed by the kind staff, but they were incredibly knowledgeable and offered additional ways to use the product I purchased. This only enhances the value of what I purchased!

name: スマタノオロチ
text:
(Translated by Google) The staff kindly told me about the shops that are not sold here because I can't speak English.
The staff here is great.

(Original)
英語ができない私にスタッフはここに売っていない物のお店を親切に教えて下さいました。
ここのスタッフは最高です。

name: O. F.
text: Wow, I was so amazed at the variety of items 3 Storks and a Baby has. Neo-natal and premature baby clothing, Shower Girl and Cute Little Tuxedos for Boys, Modern Maternity, and Christening Gowns. Rain Coats...

name: jenn caceres
text: Cute store, I went this weekend with my in laws. Employee was not wearing a mask, I was uncomfortable when the employee attempted to approach my baby to say Hi and give her a doll. The only reason we purchased something was because my mother in law wanted to buy her clothes. I love supporting local stores, but i will not coming back to this store. The clothes were cute but overpriced.

name: Danielle Roberts
text: Cashier wasn't wearing a mask, i didnt feel comfortable in there with my baby who is too young to wear a mask. Will not be back because of this.

name: Ginny Roberts
text: Largest selection of adorable children’s clothes that I have seen anywhere in Alabama. While they carry little boys clothes Their selection of dresses and play close for a little girls surpasses anything that I have seen. All this below normal retail prices. I also loved the selection of stuffed animals. Shopping her  is a wonderful experience:

name: Lara Seamon
text: 3 Storks & A Baby is such a great baby store for all of your little ones needs. Whether it's baby gear, baby toys, baby accessories to children's clothing... You name it Mary and Laura have it. They have the name brand quality items at very afford prices. They even have diaper cakes. Which we all know that is a must for a baby shower and celebration. I loved that they also have an in house seamstress for custom embroidery and clothes. I genuinely appreciate the ability to go to their baby boutique for a one stop shop!

name: Rachel Daubenmire
text: If you are looking for cute and trendy kids and baby clothes you have to go to 3 Storks & A Baby! This childrens boutique has the cutest dresses, kids clothes, baby clothes, boys suits, hair bows, shoes, and so much more at prices you can afford! They even have a seamstress on site that will make custom halloween costumes and princess dresses for your little one! Plus, if you are looking for a baby boutique with a baby registry they offer this too! Stop in and see Mary and Laura today!

name: Leon Burns
text: Great place . Good great selection great people courteous and kind

name: Charles Boatwright
text:
I like the place. It’s a big area mostly filled with accessories and mask. Thy have a small area for decorations. I looked through the store they have a wide variety even a Kim Jong-un mask. When we pulled up they had a couple of inflatables out in front a 6 foot Dino and 11-12 foot dragon. The dragon is nice the wings move also while inflated. I told them I want it and they said everyone does. I said agin I want it do I need to bring out the card to pay for it. Then they realized I ment it. It was funny. I’m sure there are others but for me this is the first I’ve seem with moving parts.
Go and look around could fine that interesting item for your house or to wear

name: S B
text: If you want to exchange something make sure to have the receipt with you.  The guy at the register made me go back out in the pouring rain to get a receipt. I was returning a $5 item in exchange for a $35 item. He should have been able to exchange without a receipt but luckily after 5 minutes I found it in my car. The lady at Spirit Halloween was wayyy friendlier!

name: Terry Ikner
text: I hate this store is only here for a few weeks it is by far my favorite Halloween store. I always track down the store to the seasonal location, but I must say the staff this year is FANTASTIC! Very attentive, knowledgeable, and willing to help in any way.

name: Stacey C.
text: The management is very rude, condescending, and tries to incite customers negatively. Additional up-to-date training should be mandatory for the staff in the future, as the current management is very unprofessional and should not be supervising or advising employees. Management should not be rehired at the company's next pop up shop.

name: Serena kay
text: My autistic son absolutely loves Halloween and the staff was very friendly and helping us thank you for the great visit.

name: Latasha Pippins
text: I am so glad that all of these reviews are so favorable. On Saturday October 26, 2019 my 23 year old daughter, my 9 year old daughter, and my 1 year old granddaughter went into this store. After browsing and finding a costume but not all of the needed accessories they left without making a purchase.They returned after visiting another Halloween store to purchase the costume. The manager then accused her of shoplifting and admitted to following them around the store. After my daughter willingly allowed her to look in her purse, finding nothing, the manager still called the police. My daughter stayed and waited on the police asking to see any video showing her shoplifting. The police officer then examined her purse and found nothing.The police officer asked them to leave and said that the manager did not want them to return to the store. I'm a little confused because I did not know that you could be banned from a store for trying to spend money, because my silly daughter was still wanting to purchase the costume.The manager never apologized or admitted to being mistaken, but she did say "that she know what "you people" do and that she was going to jail and told my 9 year old that she and her niece were going to DHR." I'm glad that the people that had these great  experiences were not the "you people"  that steal. I do not recommend that people of color shop at this store our money is no good there. I GIVE THEM NO STARS, I ACTUALLY NEED 5 OF THEM BACK, BUT THE COMPUTER WANT LET ME POST WITHOUT ONE!!!!

name: Linnea Washington
text: They are rude I paid for a item and  I left it and I called back about it and the so called manger was rude I asked for their name they refused to give it to me this is not the way to do business the manger told me they was  about to closed and she didn’t care about what I had to say I really hope the owner reads these comments because rude people should not be working in a place that deals with customer service not only is it hurting your business but it hurting your sells as well I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone they are straight rude and racist I will go to spirit Halloween from now on learn how to talk and treat people with respect regardless what color skin they may have

name: Hornaday quickfire
text: Seasonal Halloween store. Same stuff as last year.

name: Vanessa Madere
text: Not a huge selection

name: velmine B
text: Had to drive to the Hoover location instead. Hoover location staff/selection/location and overall vibe is much better.

name: Lindi Pearson
text: They have no selection, it smelled bad, and the staff had no idea about anything in the store. Hard pass

name: Paul Huck
text: Can't get to live person. Web site goes in circles. Poor service. Wantvlivevperson on store. Not an option. Only recording, repeats over & over.

name: Jeremiah Thompson
text: Pretty good selection of Halloween items, and the cashier Mallory was super helpful!!!

name: Teresa Huff
text: I couldn't find a devil costume.....

name: Supreme Nematode
text: Very nice and very spooky my favorite part was when’s Jesus checked my vibe #vibechek

name: Bibby King
text: Great selection

name: Brenda Palmer
text: Very friendly staff that meets all of your needs with a smile!!!!!   Very professional & down to earth...has good selection of items.

name: Jennifer Housley
text: These girls stay open until the last minute thank goodness, I need last minute pirate get up for my 4 year old, they hooked me up and I'm so grateful. I mean I showered up with 5 minutes to spare on closing time. They are sweet, helpful and I'll never drive all the way to Huntsville to go to the party store, ours here in town has everything!

name: Trace Ces
text:
Staff was friendly professionals helpful but not pushy. Very well stocked and neat store.
Thank You!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Glad you came in! Come see us again soon!

name: Variety with GC Warden
text: Great selection!!! Easy purchase and lady that helped me was super awesome:)

name: amber story
text: This was the 2nd year we came for there event.  Ita always fun great deals and such nice people. We will always come back!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your support! We are so glad yall came!!! :)

name: AZ Detailing
text: Courtney and her staff are fantastic people, I brought in some shirts to get printed for my company and she went above and beyond to get them done right! Courtney will always have my guaranteed business for any party, event, or vinyl work I need done! Go and see them, she guaranteed has the best prices around and you get the best service! Thanks Party Central, we’ll be in touch!

name: James Truffa
text: Good place to get stuff for a party

name: Mrs. DeAviance Fowlks-Turner
text: Rented tables,  chairs,   balloons, and other party needs. Not bad; just wish they were located in Athens, AL.

name: Diana Kritinar
text: They have a ton of fun party stuff and a great selection of balloons! Also great for cake supplies!

resp.text: Thank you Diana!!!!

name: Jeffery Robison
text: Great place for all kinds of party needs, they make it easy for those special party items.

resp.text: Thank you Jeffery! Look forward to seeing you in the store!

name: Kenyon Smith
text: They are fabulous!!!! Had so MUCH TO CHOOSE FROM!!!!  Excellent service 💗💗💗

resp.text: Thank you so much! Thank you for shopping local with Party Central :)

name: Miranda Towe
text: Very disappointed in the selection for birthday parties. They had more graduation and older kids and adult stuff than kids.

resp.text: I am very sorry we didn’t have what you wanted. We strive to keep what customers are asking for. Let us know what you were looking for so we can bring in to the store for the Decatur area.

name: Kristen Chandler
text: I used to love this store, but not after my last purchase.  Make sure to check every single item before you leave cause they give you a hard time on exchanges WITH receipts & you only get 2 exchanges.  I will not spend a single dime here again!!  Unfortunately I've already given them hundreds of dollars over the years before finding out how ridiculous they could be.. Sincerely, a very disappointed ex-customer!!  I'll be taking my money to Huntsville's party stores from now on!!

resp.text: I appreciate every customer but we don't allow returns on costumes in October for obvious reasons.  I made an exception for this customer and actually replaced masks twice that her children played in. After two exchanges I wrote no more exchanges on this ticket. Anyone that would like to know more can call me. Nancy 256-353-5555

name: Instigatee
text: Worst store ever. The owner is down right rude. I have never been so mad when I have left a store. My children were holding small toys and playing with each other. She quickly said alright kids put the toys down. Which my children didnt hesitate to do so. However, it made me mad because she never even ask if I was going to purchase these items. So I put the items that I was going to purchase up and told her I would never buy anything from her store again. She said oh well its my store. And I should teach my kids manners. My children are very well mannered. She is an old miserable lady that has nothing better to do than to try and make other peoples lives miserable. She was disrespectful and very thoughtless when dealing with a customer.

name: Kim Rutherford
text: This place has all your party supplies. Good selection.

resp.text: Thank you Kim!

name: Glenn Byrum
text: If you want to party this is the place to get ready.

resp.text: Thank you Glenn!

name: Camo Hut
text: Great service, had everything I needed and very low prices. great selection of .99¢ items

name: Sherry Kellum
text: Great service! Lots of cute items and many Halloween costumes!

name: Matthew Lalley
text: They had the perfect Invitation for my party. Thanks Guys

name: WannaWaveTV
text: I loved this place! Found everything I needed!

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Kimberly Gordon
text: Great Staff....very friendly and helpful

name: Melanie King
text: Loved it

resp.text: Hi Melanie, please let us know what we need to do to make your shopping experience with Party Central better!

name: raven Thrasher
text: Very friendly

resp.text: Thank you Raven!

name: Patty. Phillips
text: no selection

resp.text: We strive to have what our customers are looking for! Let us know what were missing so we can look at adding it in our store! Thank you!

name: Larry “Reaper” Smith
text: Great prices

name: Tracey Doodlebug
text: Not much selection

name: Bonnie Roper
text: Very helpful and friendly

resp.text: Thank you Bonnie! Come back and see us anytime :)  ___Courtney - Owner

name: Lisa Lynn Terry
text: Never been

resp.text: If i am reading this correctly you have never been. Please come to our new location on the beltline behind Starbucks  opening July 1st

name: Jay Zdonek
text: Small but had what I needed.

resp.text:
Hey Michael, glad we had what you needed! Come back soon, thanks for the review.
--Courtney, owner

name: Jennifer Perry
text: Perfect for parties

name: Staroffire Day
text:
(Translated by Google) Bio orb i.v un

(Original)
Bio orb i.v un

resp.text: I’m not sure what that means?

name: Jon Saint Germain
text: Always fun. By the time we got there this year October 12th, the store looked pretty well picked over. So the lessons: buy early, buy often.

name: Shane Kitts
text: Good place if you are an amateur on decorating for Halloween, I've been decorating for over 30 years. This isn't the place for advance Halloween decorators.

name: Editor Kitty
text: terrible, half the items were broken.. the system kept locking up on checkout. they had three anamatronics on display.. one was broken and the place was put up so poorly.. you would think they would at least try to make it look good.

name: Alexa M
text: Just awful. Very bad selection, dark fitting rooms filled with costume parts, very messy, and only one staff member. AVOID AT ALL COST.

name: Chanda
text: Product rang up at the wrong price.  Had to wait 10 min for manager to override as they were short staffed. Did not have enough choices and some were quite expensive.

name: Jason McGhee
text: Pretty cool place to visit once a year.

name: Kimberly McAbee
text: What a joke! Who would want to buy anything from a store that the item is already broken

name: Jeremy Cummings
text: Arrived at 8:00pm, sign posted clearly states they are open till 9pm on Saturdays, doors were already locked.

name: Whitney Worley
text: Had a good experience

name: Angela Boysel
text: Poor selection of costumes

name: Mike Petermen
text: A lot of choices here, for all ages.

name: Blake F
text: JUST TERRIBLE!!!!

name: Ayana Weaver
text: I don't like the no refund policy.

name: Mrs. Project Hexx
text: Good variety of items in store. Item (see pic) works after a few minutes. Not so great taste but I will still recommend.

name: JenpoJenpo Jenpo
text: Ok so I was unsure about visiting the store or doing a review.  The staff was nice and not pushy. They will card everyone that enters. They had stuff I didnt know existed so the selection was great. If you need a gift for a fun party or shower or maybe something for yourself this is a great place to go. You can see the merchandise first hand and not guess from online pictures. They test everything to make sure it works before you leave the store. They have lingerie and funny items and gifts as well as what you would expect.  It can be overwhelming but take some time, look around and maybe you will find something fun.

name: Miss Sherry
text: The associate was very helpful with helping find what I needed---felt that the staff was on the grind thought being that they got new inventory in and  was gearing up  to put it up for display. The  made sure all my items were working well and explained to me how they worked and any additional things that were needed. I spent a pretty penny, but a penny well worth it! Will definitely be back!

name: Wendy Cotton
text: It has a nice selection of merchandise.  If you are looking for stuff for a bachelorette party, that's a good place to start. The customer service was awesome.

name: Sheila Stephens
text: Good amount of merchandise in stock, good assistance in finding the product I ask for.   Would come back again.

name: iran bass
text: The right place to help keep the old relationship interesting. Bring money.

name: Rachael Harkness
text: Great quality stuff love this place

name: Chanele Lewis
text: Employees not so friendly. One was kind rude the other kind of nice. The one lady immediately asked for my Id its like two other people in here but you ask for my id.I will never come here again . I'm dam near 50 smh. No disrespect to the company. That may be your policy but be consistent with the policy.

name: Sarah Sendy
text: People working there werent friendly or helpful. I didnt like how things were organized. They didn't have a lot. Wouldn't go back

name: Keashonia Walker
text: I liked this place. One of the girls who worked there was kinda pushy. The other understood that I came for something specific and just let me know about the sales. I do not like that I couldn't take pictures to be sure I picked up what I had previously been told to get. Overall, I'm going back.

name: LaDawn Knighton
text: Great customer service from the sales team not a fan of management. They definitely need to work on their people skills. Soft skills like great communication and making the customer or anyone feel welcomed goes a very long way.

name: Latoya Thompson
text: Staff was friendly.. Plenty of items to choose from.. Clean and plenty of walking space

name: justin carter
text: I'd give a negative if possible. Used to shop here all the time. Never again

name: tina benz
text: Store says it all. However I will say the employees here are awful.  Terrible.   They make fun of customers right there with customer there.  They talk in 3rd party and refer to her as different but you would have to be really completely dumb not to know. They did it to me.  Twice.  I knew they were talking about me. The first time I ended up leaving items there and leaving without purchase.  2nd time I just ignored them and pretended it wasnt me. Sigh. They just about ruined it both times. Not sure I will go back but not sure of another store like this one.  Anybody knoe?

name: Lori Morgan
text: Super friendly employee. And very clean organized store.

name: Sandra Davis
text: nice and interesting items. friendly staff. great personality. visit you'll know which one that stands out with the comedian inside them

name: Neq H
text: Pretty good selection here. I recommend their Oxford store, though. The variety is better and an overall better experience.

name: Cash Younts
text: Awesome place. Friendly staff always willing to help.

name: Cash Younts
text: Awesome place. Friendly staff always willing to help.

name: Adam Ellis
text: Friendly staff. Good selection.

name: Paul Edmonds
text:
It was late and they were going to close how ever the clerk stayed open just for me !
Awesome stuff, great fun!!

name: Iris P
text: Alot of merchandise and everything is set up nicely I gave it a 4 star for overall just some prices are high on things I love the workers there they make me feel comfortable

name: Ricky hww are you Weldon
text: Good selection prices are high great service

name: Ty Di TAE
text: Really wasn't a inviting atmosphere I felt as if the fact that I couldn't go on my Snapchat or live or FaceTime because of the store regulations was very invasive of my personal rights wasn't trying to show any of the customers it was just more of me asking the friend a question and I feel as if I wasn't allowed my rights by doing that also they wasn't knowledgeable or customer-friendly when it came to certain products or questions it was oh I'm just here on the clock

name: Sweet ROSE
text: Always have fun there 🤣🤣

name: Dan Green
text: I love visiting all these stores. Everyone is friendly and they have a lot of knowledge about their products!

name: Radiant Beauty
text: Prices too dang high...u better off at pleasures or buying online

name: Gerald Egleson
text: The prices are high but the ladies on staff are very helpful and knowledgeable.

name: Mathew Griswould
text: Very polite and professional staff. Very knowledgable of products sold.

name: Courtney Garrett
text: Great place. Wonderful staff

name: Brandon McDaniel
text: Super helpful staff!

name: kelly moses
text: Worst customer service ever! Ive had to deal with corporate two months now. They dont return phone calls. I bought a product that was packaged wrong..so the product I was wanting wasn't what I was getting, probably why the charger wasn't working with this product but I couldn't return it. Called corporate. "Heather" told me she would send me a new one. Waited about 2 weeks and then called back to find out when it would arrive. She tells me it was already shipped by ups. I never got a tracking number from the beginning and I was home when it supposedly delivered. I never got the package! The ups driver never delivered the package to my address. I filed a police report...ups is reimbursing them so they can reship my product that got lost in the mail but get this....instead of making it right and reshipping, Kalli's is keeping that money. Heather tells me there is nothing more she can do that if I still have my receipt I can send that along with the used product to the manufacturer in hopes they replace my product. I will never shop at a Kalli's again after this experience.

name: Treresa Motes
text: The staff was very helpful and was a nice clean environment

name: kenyon booz
text: everthing you need, prices could be better though

name: Matt Na
text: Alot of costumes and product pretty good prices

name: Donna Bartlett
text: This Halloween store was just okay. The animatronics were great, but the prices were a little bit high, which is to be expected, there was a guy shopping without a mask and the staff was running around, goofing off with each other.

name: Scott Seeley
text: Good selection of inexpensive costumes in a bag -  Had what we needed at discounted prices.

name: Dave Jackman
text: Good selection of stuff and prices seem pretty reasonable. Fun to look around. This year the store is in two different locations in the mall. Costumes are in one and the other is mostly Halloween decor.

name: Crystal Gregory
text: How about NO STARS.  I bought a costume and changed my mind.  They will not refund or give store credit.  You have to exchange on the spot.  That is not right, especially when they do not have your size in any costume you are interested in.  DO NOT SHOP HERE.

name: Lee-Anne Hooks
text: So much great stuff!

name: Christy Heard
text: Didn't have too much for pre teen girls

name: Benjamin Fouché
text: Great stuff and great people.  Awesome animatronics and costumes.

name: Shawn Caudill
text: I wouldn't even rate it. Our costumes cost 100 all together. get it home and the stitching is already coming out. I live so far sway and the only thing they offered was to stich the costume what a rip off. Not to mention they are so cheap.would have been better off to make them myself.

name: Michael Conniff
text: Great directions, no issues.  There are two Halloween Express' in the mall.

name: Keepn It reall
text: Great place

name: Steve Sanford
text: Excellent selection and better customer service. My daughter needed a costume for a school project and every other Costume store was either closed or had a limited childrens selection because it was so far from Halloween season (early march)... I totally forgot until the day before so I didn't have time to order a costume online. I Called maybe a dozen places before I got in touch with these guys. Not only did they help me find something that worked, they had it in stock, and even though I was only buying 60 dollars worth of costumes, they drove over an hour to meet me so that I could get the costume in time for my daughter's school project. Then they drove another hour back. I can't imagine it was worth it monetarily for them to do something like this, but they did it anyway to help out. I can't imagine any other halloween mega store would do something like this...If great customer service and spending your money with a business run by good people means anything to you, I would reccomend you go here for costume/Halloween needs. They deserve your business in my opinion. Much more than your average local/seasonal Halloween chain franchise. 5 stars... will be driving out of my way in the future to shop here.

name: Cecily Caudle
text: Great selections! Love looking at the displays.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting us and we appreciate the pictures you posted! They’re awesome!

name: Rebecca Fischer
text: Amazing staff!! Let you try on masks and help with all your needs

name: Vickie Victoriana
text: Prices were high and products were not so good. Got better quality costumes and wigs much cheaper on line. But there was a large selection of costumes there.

name: m chadwick
text: Plenty of options for 14/16 and under sizes...There are great masks prices are pushing $$$...must go look around..

name: Aratolliah “Koko” Moorer
text: This place does not exist at this location.

name: Jacob Chad
text: WELP, WENT IN TODAY..NOBODY ACKNOWLEDGED OUR EXISTENCE, COULD'VE WALKED OUT WITH HALF THE STORE FOR ALL THEY KNEW..GOOD LOOKING OUT CUSTOMER SERVICE, HOPE THE FOOD YOU WERE CRAMMING IN YOUR MOUTH WAS GOOD.

name: izzy Moorer
text: Awesome place to shop for all your needs

name: Felisha Brown
text: Great shopping experience! Everyone was very helpful and super friendly!!

name: Chanel DJ Keitges
text: Great employees!!!!! Helpful. Awesome costumes!!!!
